title: Peace with her foure garders Viz. fiue morall meditations: of concord, chastitie, constancie. Courtesie. Grauitie. Eschew euill, and doe good, seeke peace and ensue it.
author: Aylett, Robert, 1583-1655?
publisher: Printed [by G. Purslowe] for Iohn Teage, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Ball,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
